title: Journey Orchestration Step Data Fetch Fields
description: Journey Orchestration Data Fetch Field for a Step Event.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Journey Step Event Data Fetch Field.
fetchTypeInError
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The source of the first error that occurred while fetching fields to compute a journey step. Set to either Custom or AEP.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchError
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Error condition that prevented Journey Runtime from executing the fetch. E.g: capping on the Data Source API etc, http error.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchOriginError
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: In case of http error, the latest API response message. E.g: invalid payload, internal server error.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchCount
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: (Deprecated)Sum of number of calls made to custom data source and to AEP to fetch the required details to process a step. E.g: To process a condition step.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchPlatformTotalTime
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Total time(ms) to fetch all the required fields from the custom data source to execute the step.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchPlatformCount
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Number of calls made to AEP to fetch the required details to process a step.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchCustomTotalTime
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Total time(ms) to fetch all the required fields from the custom data source to execute the step.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchCustomCount
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Number of calls made to custom data source and to AEP to fetch the required details to process a step. E.g: To process a condition step.
